official-title.#text:
Providing for further consideration of the bill (H.R. 4435) to authorize appropriations for fiscal
			 year 2015 for military activities of the Department of Defense and for
			 military construction, to prescribe military personnel strengths for such
			 fiscal year, and for other purposes; and providing for consideration of
			 the bill (H.R. 3361) to reform the authorities of the Federal Government
			 to require the production of certain business records, conduct electronic
			 surveillance, use pen registers and trap and trace devices, and use other
			 forms of information gathering for foreign intelligence, counterterrorism,
			 and criminal purposes, and for other purposes.

At the conclusion of consideration of the bill for amendment the Committee shall rise and report
			 the bill to the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: the bill (

)
			 to reform the authorities of the Federal Government to require the
